creator: Lynnet Wambui Muritu
author: Lynnet Wambui Muritu
description: This is a Podcast where we elevate young African voices in their richness and bareness. We are located in New York from Zimbabwe and Kenya. We will be having honest, intelligent, insightful conversations with the aim of bringing to you what it means to be existing as a young African away from home.
title: The Afro Existing Podcast

itunes.summary: This is a Podcast where we elevate young African voices in their richness and bareness. We are located in New York from Zimbabwe and Kenya. We will be having honest, intelligent, insightful conversations with the aim of bringing to you what it means to be existing as a young African away from home.
itunes.author: Lynnet Wambui Muritu

items.creator: Lynnet Wambui Muritu

itunes.summary:
In this episode, I (Wambui) do a solo episode taking you through the where we disappeared to, why we are back, what the plan is: and other fun podcasting things. Then I tell you a story about my first time coming to New York and most recently, my experience getting the Covid Vaccine. Spoiler: I had a really tough experience with it. haha. 


Hope you enjoy! And check us out on Instagram @theafroexistingpodcast

items.dc:creator: Lynnet Wambui Muritu
items.title: Where have I been? Stories from the summer and oh, we're back!
items.content:
In this episode, I (Wambui) do a solo episode taking you through the where we disappeared to, why we are back, what the plan is: and other fun podcasting things. Hope you enjoy! And check us out on Instagram @theafroexistingpodcast

items.creator: Lynnet Wambui Muritu

itunes.summary: Hello! Welcome to the first episode of the Afro Existing Podcast! We are so glad you are here and hope you stay.  Subscribe to get notified when we upload next week. *Excited because it is actually happening.  Please leave us a review and message us @theafroexistingpodcast to let us know what you think.

items.dc:creator: Lynnet Wambui Muritu
items.title: And We are Live! Here's to new Beginnings | Get to know us, Friends, Campus and Just Existing
